metadata.title: CVE-2022-48624 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.description:
close_altfile in filename.c in less before 606 omits shell_quote calls forLESSCLOSE.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-48624` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

less - 590-2ubuntu0.23.10.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: less package in mantic was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '590-2ubuntu0.23.10.1').
